title: Man dies after falling off boat in Sandy Hook Bay, police say
body: A man died after falling overboard from a boat Saturday, officials said.New Jersey State Police Marine Services received a report of a man overboard from a 37-foot vessel in Sandy Hook Bay at 2:53 p.m., public information officer Sgt. Philip Curry said.The victim was recovered unresponsive. Officials are investigating the incident and aren’t releasing any other information at this time, Curry said.Note to readers: if you purchase something through one of our affiliate links we may earn a commission.
